messages.title: We've been let down
messages.content: Your choice on June 8th. Labour wasting our cash. Labour are too split to stand up for us.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that the NHS is properly funded and not undermined by Labour underfunding or Conservative cuts
Tax fairly, ensuring corporations and the wealthy pay their fair share of taxes

issues.health: Ensure that the NHS is properly funded and not undermined by Labour underfunding or Conservative cuts

endorsements.endorsement: Delivered more extra cash for Derby schools with Lucy Care than Labour or Tories ever did.
Lucy Care has the experience to deliver for Derby North.
Lucy took the trouble to listen to our concerns.
I've seen Lucy Care's dedication and hard work for Derby.
Lucy's dedication to Derby is fantastic.
I trust Lucy Care to fight against school cuts.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Quotes about Jeremy Corbyn being a 'splintered leader' and not up for the job.
